Returns: a string representation of this SecretKeyEntry.
toString().Description: Returns a string representation of this SecretKeyEntry.

getSecretKey().Description: Gets the SecretKey from this entry.

KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry(javax.crypto.Sec.Description: Constructs a SecretKeyEntry with a SecretKey.

Throws: if secretKey or attributes is null
KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry(javax.crypto.Sec.Description: Constructs a SecretKeyEntry with a SecretKey and associated entry attributes. The specified attributes is cloned before it is stored in the new SecretKeyEntry object.

Returns: an unmodifiable Set of attributes, possibly empty
getAttributes().Description: Retrieves the attributes associated with an entry.

ClassDesc: A KeyStore entry that holds a SecretKey.
